levels.description:
Attacks hit <@ba.vup>2</> enemies; ATK <@ba.vup>+{reed2_skil_3[switch_mode].atk:0%}</>; Talent 1 activation chance increases to <@ba.vup>100%</>; enemies with the Cinder effect take <@ba.vup>{talent@s3_atk_scale:0%}</> of Reed the Flame Shadow's ATK as Arts damage per second, and when defeated deal <@ba.vup>{talent@aoe_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Arts damage and inflict Cinder to nearby enemies
<@ba.rem>Cinder lasts until this skill expires</>
